import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import '../customcss.css'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Modal, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import AddUser from '../users/AddUser'; export default function Home() { // add employee const [AddIsOpen, setAddOpen] = React.useState(false); const [EditIsOpen, setEditOpen] = React.useState(false); const [DeleteIsOpen, setDeleteOpen] = React.useState(false); const showAddModal = () => { setAddOpen(true); }; const hideAddModal = () => { setAddOpen(false); }; const showEditModal = () => { setEditOpen(true); }; const hideEditModal = () => { setEditOpen(false); } const showDeleteModal = () => { setDeleteOpen(true); }; const hideDeleteModal = () => { setDeleteOpen(false); } const [users,setUsers]= useState([]) // self running running function useEffect(()=> { loadUsers(); }, []); const loadUsers=async()=>{ const result = await axios.get("http://localhost:8080/api/getEmployees"); setUsers(result.data); } return ( <> {/* Add modal */} Edit Employee
